sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import {Grid, Col, Row} from 'react-styled-flexboxgrid'
import GlobalStyle from '../../src/Utils/GlobalStyle.js'
import GridBlock from './Layout.js'

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<GlobalStyle />
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"layout"}}>{`Layout`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`import {Grid, Col, Row} from 'react-styled-flexboxgrid'`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<Row>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
</Row>
<Row>
  <Col xs={12} sm={3} md={2} lg={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={6} sm={6} md={8} lg={10}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={6} sm={3} md={2} lg={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
</Row>
<Row>
  <Col xs={12} sm={3} md={2} lg={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={12} sm={9} md={10} lg={11}><GridBlock /></Col>
</Row>
<Row>
  <Col xs={10} sm={6} md={8} lg={10}><GridBlock /></Col>
  <Col xs={2} sm={6} md={4} lg={2}><GridBlock /></Col>
</Row>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"introduction"}}>{`Introduction`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"responsive-breakpoint"}}>{`Responsive Breakpoint`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"center"}}>{`Target`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"center"}}>{`Name`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"center"}}>{`Pixel`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"center"}}>{`Rem`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">

<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"flexbox-grid"}}>{`Flexbox Grid`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Taken from react-styled-flexboxgrid.
Responsive modifiers enable specifying different column sizes, offsets, alignment and distribution at xs, sm, md & lg viewport widths.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`xs={12} sm={3} md={2} lg={1}`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={3} __code={'{/* Add <Grid> as container */}\n{/* Use <Grid fluid> for fluid container */}\n<Row>\n  <Col xs={12} sm={3} md={2} lg={1}>\n    <GridBlock />\n  </Col>\n  <Col xs={6} sm={6} md={8} lg={10}>\n    <GridBlock />\n  </Col>\n  <Col xs={6} sm={3} md={2} lg={1}>\n    <GridBlock />\n  </Col>\n</Row>\n<Row>\n  <Col xs={12} sm={3} md={2} lg={1}>\n    <GridBlock />\n  </Col>\n  <Col xs={12} sm={9} md={10} lg={11}>\n    <GridBlock />\n  </Col>\n</Row>\n<Row>\n  <Col xs={10} sm={6} md={8} lg={10}>\n    <GridBlock />\n  </Col>\n  <Col xs={2} sm={6} md={4} lg={2}>\n    <GridBlock />\n  </Col>\n</Row>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Grid,Col,Row,GlobalStyle,GridBlock}}>

    {/* Use <Grid fluid> for fluid container */}
  <Row>
    <Col xs={12} sm={3} md={2} lg={1}><GridBlock /></Col>
    <Col xs={6} sm={6} md={8} lg={10}><GridBlock /></Col>

  </Row>
